text: “Kodi chilipo chimene akudikira kuposa kuwadzera angelo (kudzawachotsa miyoyo yawo?) Kapena kudza Mbuye wako (tsiku la Qiyâma kuzaweruza)? Kapena kudza zina mwa zizindikiro za Mbuye wako (zomwe adati zidzadza)? Tsiku lakudza zina mwa zizindikiro za Mbuye wako, munthu (wosakhulupirira) chikhulupiliro chake (panthawiyo) sichidzamthandiza, yemwe sadakhulupirirepo kale, kapena (msilamu) yemwe sanapindule nacho chikhulupiliro chake. Nena: “Dikirani. Nafenso tikudikira.”
